review: Its a great device, but expectations didnt match. I was led to believe that chromecast works with Chrome on Nexus 7 tab also. Apparently, all it works is - Chrome/YouTube on Laptops and YouTube only from Android.Got this item in a super nice package, thanks to Amazon and Google. Pity, I had to return it.To be fair, when I run YouTube from Tab or Chrome from Laptop, it works flawlessly.Will buy it if Chrome from tab is supported. Till then, adieu.
author: Kashyap Mhaisekar

review: Google has created a masterpiece in "ChromeCast".  It should have been dubbed "platinumCast", cause this little jewel is priceless at only 35.00.  It's already a major force in my house as if it was always a part of our entertainment arsenal.  Unbelievably user friendly, and the price, Google has definitely created a following, and still made a tidy profit.

review: not as good or as many apps as roku but a lot cheaper. works good video quality good.easy to install

review: I am in love with the Chromecast. I hate having cords showing, and I hate connecting 3-4 things to my TV and having different controls for each. While I already had an Xbox connected to my TV and could watch all of the same things through that interface, I didn't like to turn on the Xbox and wait for it to boot up and navigate the menus all so I could watch Breaking Bad on netflix. The device is insanely simple to connect and works well with my Moto X.
author: chris

review: Very useful device, easy to set up. Makes getting data to the large screen a breeze. Recommend those who play videos on computer invest!
author: Trevor Phillip Wallace Witt

review: This thing, I knew I wanted a TV, this chromecast stick drive and some other things like router, modem, high speed internet, computer, streaming accounts, etc. Anyway, I digress, this thing is off the hook! Stream anything and everything onto my HDTV, including YouTube videos of bunnies!
